item.description:
[DOWNGRADED TO AN UNOFFICIAL EVENT ON ACCOUNT OF THE WILD WEATHER. SHOW UP AND SLED (OR SNOWBALL) AT YOUR OWN RISK!]

Join Socializing for Justice at the JP "Bowl" for Sledding and Snowballing for Justice!



*Moraine Street dead ends into the Jamaicaway at the Pond. Meet us there. http://maps.google.co...

Join us, if you've been looking for like-minded progressives to sled with in Boston, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while packing snowballs, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. Be sure not to miss it if you are ready to build cross-issue coalitions - AND have fun!

At Socializing for Justice (SoJust) events you can hang out with friends, make new ones, find a date, get the scoop on a job, and find out what's going on this weekend - political or social. And the best part is that SoJust members share your vision of building a more just world.

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and learn about our Suggested Annual Membership Fee.
item.name: Sledding (and Snowballing) for Justice
